__e: Something you probably don't understand, and maybe you never will.
Maybe you can't understand it. It took me a very long time to find out who I am.
One day I won't be able to help you because I won't be here, and then maybe you'll understand why I wanted you to learn to do stuff for yourself!
One thing you'll understand after you've been here longer than 15 minutes, is that we police ourselves so the handful of people in the government that actually know about us, won't do worse.
- Clerk is a very importantjob... that you will understand when you're older... of which job you can be very proud.
I used to feel that way, too, but you'll understand when you're a little bit older.
So I think you'll understand when I tell you that...
And so I know you'll understand when I say I cannot stay and be your "fix-it" man.
- Clerk is a very importantjob... that you will understand when you're older... of which job you can be very proud.
You can hang out and see what I do and why I'm so tired all the time you do seem overly tired for a woman your age.
And perhaps in 200 years, you'll understand why I do the things I do.
Spend few months with me.. ..and you'll know what I do and why.
You can take my life, but my soul is my own, something you will never understand.
Lesser Love isn't for me but no matter what I say, you'll never understand.
I'm sorry, you will never understand what happens when you're in prison.
Maybe you don't realize this until you have kids of your own, but being a father is really hard.
You're not going to understand it, I know, but I want you to believe me as you always have when I tell you it's for the best.
I know you will never entirely comprehend this, Raymond, but you must believe I did not know it would be you.
Since I have to be up in six hours, you'll understand if it doesn't go right to the top.
But if I don't come back, in time, I hope that you'll realize that I didn't have a choice.
In fact, you'll realize that the only thing to do in your position when it comes to me is nothing.
